Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
This creature does not look very
important.Black feathered wings
sprout from its shoulders and green
venom drips from its claws.

Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
This beast wanders the land in search
of quest items forgotten by
adventurers. Smoke billows from its
nostrils as it prepares to attack.

Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
A questing beast is searching for quest
items to complete its card. A strange
shimmering sparkle hovers in the air
nearby.

Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
This beast looks quite fearsome as it
stalks the land, seeking to complete
its first quest card. Black leathery
wings sprout from its back, and a fetid
stench comes from its yellowed fangs.

Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
This is the most fearsome questing
beast you have yet encountered.
Silver sparkles dance across its skin
as it mumbles arcane phrases in your
direction.

Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
This is the largest questing beast you
will ever see. A sulforous stench
wafts from its skin as it searches for
items for its quest card.

Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
A strange mythical creature is here
fleeing from Sir Pelinore. You have never
seen its like before.

Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
A strange mythical creature stands
before you, silvery sparkles dance
across skin as it speaks the words
of a mighty spell.

Mobiles.Name: questing beast
Mobiles.Long_Description: A questing beast wanders the land
Mobiles.Description:
A strange mythical creature searches
for its kin. Smoke wisps from it's
mouth and nostrils.

Objects.Name: sword
Objects.Description: You see a standard issue sword here.

Extra_Descr_Data.Description:
You see a sword of great craftsmanship.
Imprinted on the side is: Mute Industries

Rooms.Name: The Quest Generator
Rooms.Description:
This room is occupied by a single
strange looking machine, which stands
in the corner making clicks, whirr's
and other strange noises.

Rooms.Name: The Quest Generator
Rooms.Description:
This room has a single machine, which
creates objects and mobiles for
questing.

Rooms.Name: The Quest Generator
Rooms.Description:
This plain room has no decoration or
detail. Its sole purpose is to annoy
players with it's creation.

Rooms.Name: The Quest Generator
Rooms.Description:
Another room with the sole purpose
of making questing more interesting.

Rooms.Name: The Quest Generator
Rooms.Description:
A strange machine has been placed in
the corner, to create quest items and
creatures.

Rooms.Name: The Quest Generator
Rooms.Description:
Another plain room with a strange
machine. Once again doors lead off
in all directions.

Rooms.Name: The Quest Generator
Rooms.Description:
Another plain room. But this is where
the new quests really begin. Portals
lead off in all directions.
